entry.def: Fisheries are areas of the sea where fish are caught in large quantities for commercial purposes.
A fishery is a place where fish are bred and reared.

means.word_mean: 1. a workplace where fish are caught and processed and sold

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,情况"; 2. 表名词,"场所,地点"

stems_affixes.word_buile: brave勇敢的+ery行为,情况→n.[U]英勇,勇敢;勇气
bribe贿赂+ery行为,情况→n.贿赂的行为
chicane诈骗+ery行为,情况→n.欺诈,欺骗
ef出+front前面+ery行为,情况→脸面出去→不要脸
robb=rob抢+ery行为,情况→n.抢劫,劫掠,盗取
trick诡计+ery行为,情况→n.欺骗,诡计
bake烤+ery场所,地点→烤[面包]的地方
cemet睡觉+ery场所,地点→n.坟墓,墓地,坟场
green绿色+ery场所,地点→n.温室,草木
monast一个人住+ery场所,地点→n.男修道院,僧院
nurse养育,护理+ery场所,地点→nursery托儿所
